title: The Birth of an Honorary Little Demon
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Yoshiko-chan, how did you become a fallen angel?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I used to be an angel. However, god became jealous of this Yohane and had  me fall into the demon world…. You probably wouldn’t understand this feeling, Emma<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’m sorry. I can’t really picture it myself, but it must’ve been painful….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kukuku, painful? No. Because now, this Yohane has an amazing magical power that surpasses even god himself!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>But…. but…. It must’ve been so sad to be chased out even though you didn’t do anything wrong. Yoshi-.... Yohane-chan, is there anything I can do to help?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>There’s only so much a human can do. That’s right…. How about you make a contract with the fallen angel Yohane and become a little demon….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>A little demon….! What should I do after I become a little demon?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh? That’s, uhh…. Fuh…. Until the day this Yohane beckons you, you’re free to live and worship me….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I understand….! I’ll definitely become a helpful little demon of yours, Yohane-chan….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>You may look forward to the day when Yohane gives you an order!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
